select `pd`.`cardpageId` AS `page_id`, `pd`.`fid` AS `fid`, -(1) AS `sub_page_rank` from (`cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_page_site_map` `psm` join `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_page_details` `pd` on((`psm`.`cardpageId` = `pd`.`cardpageId`))) where ((`pd`.`pageDetailVersion` = -(1)) and (`psm`.`categoryId` = 35)) union select `spm`.`subpageid` AS `page_id`, `pd`.`fid` AS `fid`, `spm`.`rank` AS `sub_page_rank` from (`cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_subpage_page_map` `spm` join `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_page_details` `pd` on((`spm`.`masterpageid` = `pd`.`cardpageId`))) where ((`pd`.`pageDetailVersion` = -(1)) and (`spm`.`siteid` = 35))

select `cl`.`affiliate_id` AS `affiliate_id`, `cl`.`website_id` AS `website_id`, `cl`.`card_id` AS `card_id`, `cl`.`date` AS `date_inserted`, ifnull(`co`.`approvalSalesCount`, 0) AS `saleClickCount`, '0' AS `nonSaleClickCount`, ifnull(`co`.`applicationSalesCount`, 0) AS `applicationsCount`, ifnull(`co`.`crossSaleCount`, 0) AS `crossSaleCount`, ifnull(`cl`.`totalclicks`, 0) AS `totalClicks`, ifnull(`co`.`totalcommission`, 0) AS `totalCommission`, '0' AS `nonSalesClickCommission`, '0' AS `salesClickCommission` from (`cccomus${database.suffix}`.`click_summary` `cl` left join `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`commission_summary` `co` on(((`co`.`affiliate_id` = `cl`.`affiliate_id`) and (`co`.`card_id` = `cl`.`card_id`) and (`co`.`date` = `cl`.`date`) and (`co`.`website_id` = `cl`.`website_id`))))

select `cl`.`affiliate_id` AS `affiliate_id`, `cl`.`website_id` AS `website_id`, `cl`.`card_id` AS `card_id`, `cl`.`date` AS `date_inserted`, ifnull(`co`.`approvalSalesCount`, 0) AS `saleClickCount`, '0' AS `nonSaleClickCount`, ifnull(`co`.`applicationSalesCount`, 0) AS `applicationsCount`, ifnull(`co`.`crossSaleCount`, 0) AS `crossSaleCount`, ifnull(`cl`.`totalclicks`, 0) AS `totalClicks`, ifnull(`co`.`totalcommission`, 0) AS `totalCommission`, ifnull(`rs`.`sales_rev`, 0) AS `totalRevenue`, ifnull(`co`.`totalAdjustment`, 0) AS `totalAdjustment`, '0' AS `nonSalesClickCommission`, '0' AS `salesClickCommission` from ((`cccomus${database.suffix}`.`click_summary` `cl` left join `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`commission_summary` `co` on(((`co`.`affiliate_id` = `cl`.`affiliate_id`) and (`co`.`card_id` = `cl`.`card_id`) and (`co`.`date` = `cl`.`date`) and (`co`.`website_id` = `cl`.`website_id`)))) left join `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`revenue_summary` `rs` on(((`rs`.`affiliate_id` = `cl`.`affiliate_id`) and (`rs`.`card_id` = `cl`.`card_id`) and (`rs`.`post_date` = `cl`.`date`) and (`rs`.`website_id` = `cl`.`website_id`))))
